010package imagingbook.pub.threshold.global;
011
012/**
013 * This thresholder implements the algorithm proposed by Ridler and Calvard (1978),
014 * T.W. Ridler, S. Calvard, Picture thresholding using an iterative selection method,
015 * IEEE Trans. System, Man and Cybernetics, SMC-8 (August 1978) 630-632.
016 * described in Glasbey/Horgan: "Image Analysis for the Biological Sciences" (Ch. 4).
017 * 
018 * Fast version using tables of background and foreground means.
019 */
020public class IsodataThresholder extends GlobalThresholder {
021        
022        private int MAX_ITERATIONS = 100;
023
024        private double[] M0 = null;             // table of background means
025        private double[] M1 = null;             // table of foreground means
026        
027        public IsodataThresholder() {
028                super();
029        }
030
031        public int getThreshold(int[] h) {
032                makeMeanTables(h);
033                int K = h.length;
034                int q = (int) M0[K-1];  // start with total mean
035                int q_;
036                
037                int i = 0;
038                do {
039                        i++; 
040                        if (M0[q]<0 || M1[q]<0)  // background or foreground is empty
041                                return -1;
042                        q_ = q;                         
043                        q = (int) ((M0[q] + M1[q])/2);
044                } while (q != q_ && i < MAX_ITERATIONS);
045                
046                return q;
047        }
048        
049        private void makeMeanTables(int[] h) {
050                int K = h.length;
051                M0 = new double[K];
052                M1 = new double[K];
053                int n0 = 0;
054                long s0 = 0;
055                for (int q = 0; q < K; q++) {
056                        n0 = n0 + h[q];
057                        s0 = s0 + q * h[q];
058                        M0[q] = (n0 > 0) ? ((double) s0)/n0 : -1;
059                }
060//              int N = n0;
061                
062                int n1 = 0;
063                long s1 = 0;
064                M1[K-1] = 0;
065                for (int q = h.length-2; q >= 0; q--) {
066                        n1 = n1 + h[q+1];
067                        s1 = s1 + (q+1) * h[q+1];
068                        M1[q] = (n1 > 0) ? ((double) s1)/n1 : -1;
069                }
070                
071//              return N;
072        }
073        
074}
